body.name: Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight Body & Face Lotion, With Retinol & Peptide Complex, 7 oz.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 45 mins
features: Contains one (1) 7-ounce tube of Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight
Contains retinol to help visibly tighten and lift skin for a more youthful appearance
Clinically shown to firm the look of skin in one week
Hydrates skin for 24 hours with nourishing shea and cocoa butter
Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight lotion is for everyday use on body and face
body.description: Smoother-looking skin is a sleep away with Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight Body and Face Lotion. Formulated with retinol, the most clinically tested anti-aging ingredient, this lotion for mature skin helps visibly improve bounce and elasticity to skin. How it works: Retinol supports skin's collagen to visibly tighten and lift skin for a more youthful appearance. This Gold Bond Age Renew lotion also provides long-lasting hydration with nourishing shea and cocoa butter. The non-drying, non-irritating retinol formula even locks in moisture while you sleep. Best of all, this dermatologist-developed and tested lotion is hypoallergenic and free from parabens, dyes and fragrances. It's suitable for all over the body and face everyday use, when used as directed. Experience visible improvement in fine lines and wrinkles with Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight lotion. Your skin is a champion. One that never settles for silver. Gold Bond is high-performance skin care for real life so you can be your best while keeping your skin at its best. Based on number of clinical tests for anti-aging efficacy At 8 weeks with daily use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clinically Shown To Reveal Smoother-Looking Skin Overnight Retinol & Peptide Complex Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight Body & Face Lotion features a retinol-peptide complex to help visibly tighten and lift the skin for a more youthful appearance. It contains stabilized retinol to maintain efficacy over time. It’s designed for nighttime use to help renew your skin and lock in moisture while you sleep. 7 Moisturizers + 3 Vitamins This body and face lotion with retinol locks in moisture while you sleep. It’s clinically shown to instantly hydrate skin and provide continuous moisture for 24 hours. All-Over Body Use Gold Bond Overnight Retinol Lotion is gentle for everyday use on body and face. The nonirritating formula absorbs quickly and is nongreasy. Best of all, this Gold Bond Age Renew Lotion will not clog pores.

Frequently Asked Questions What does retinol do? Retinol is the most clinically tested anti-aging ingredient.* It supports the skin renewal process by exfoliating to reveal smoother, younger-looking skin. Gold Bond uses stabilized retinol to maintain its efficacy over time. 93% saw visibly smooth skin in just three days. *Based on number of clinical tests for anti-aging efficacy. Will this retinol cream dry out my skin? This Gold Bond lotion is dermatologist-developed and tested to be a non-drying, non-irritating retinol formula. It also contains hydrating shea butter and cocoa butter to nourish skin for 24 hours. Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight Daily Body & Face Lotion is free from parabens, phthalates, dyes, and fragrances. When will I see results? 84% saw visible improvement in skin smoothness overnight. What’s more, Gold Bond Age Renew Retinol Overnight Lotion is clinically shown to reveal smoother-looking skin in just one day.

SEE IT NOW SEE IT NOW SEE IT NOW SEE IT NOW SEE IT NOW Form Body and face lotion Body and face lotion Neck and chest cream Body cream Body lotion Why You’ll Love It Clinically shown to reveal smoother, younger-looking skin with retinol-peptide complex. Clinically shown to reveal brighter-looking skin with vitamin C complex and it contains naturally sourced, stabilized vitamin C to preserve potency over time. Salicylic acid (BHA) helps exfoliate to reveal a younger-looking complexion on the neck and chest. Targeted body cream helps fade the look of spots caused by sun damage. Firms and improves the texture of skin with 7 plumping moisturizers. Use on Face ✓ ✓ Use on Hands ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Use on Body ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its light and smooth. Very comfortable and nonirritating
reviews.reviewText: I use it mostly on my hands and neck. It feels light and very comfortable and it has no scent which is great for those who are sensitive to that. For the price and the amount you get for a body lotion that have great ingredients including retinol and vitamins i say its worth the try and see how much improvement it gives to the look of your hands and/or neck. I havent used it on my other parts of my body since im using a diff product with retinol on my face. They also ship it with tape on the opening so it wouldnt spill out which is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This lotion works great.
reviews.reviewText: Lotion glides on smoothly and absorbs into skin nice without a film on top of skin. Moisturizing and feels nice on body. I can see a difference in the texture of my skin after a few applications. Will purchase this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars IF YOU WANT SOFT SKIN, THIS IS IT
reviews.reviewText: I have to say, for the price this is a gem find. It made my dry skin look moist and feels so soft. I put it on after I shower and there is no sticky feeling at all. It glides on fast and smooth BUT there is one issue I have with this amazing lotion. THE SMELL. It smells like smoked meat from a fair. I'm not sure if other people would agree but every time I put it on, I feel like I just ate some smoked meat. However, it's OK with me because I can always put another layer of my favorite scented lotion on top. But this is such a great lotion, I will keep purchasing it !!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle for both my face and body
reviews.reviewText: I love that this lotion can be used on my face as well as the rest of my body just wish it came in a larger size bottle. It absorbs quickly, no greasy feeling or excessive dryness and irritation that sometimes comes with retinol products. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not too thick or greasy. Has a slight yellow tint, which seems like a good sign that retinol is an ingredient. But they don't state what retinol concentration actually is (few if any brands do). Still, applying at night leaves my skin softer next day - more so than other creams. Can't say I've seen any firming effects beyond what any moisturizer might do. But I haven't taken photos or used regularly enough to expect significant improvements. That said, for the price and the general improvement in my skin's moisture, I'll continue to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My skin is so soft!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve only been using this product for a few days and I’m seeing some amazing results. My skin looks and feels softer. I do feel some firming effect also. It smells a little strange almost like medicine ointment kinda but I just pair it with a little of my normal lotion which smells like vanilla and it’s fine :) I highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Can sting, pretty thick and creamy
reviews.reviewText: The texture is thick and creamy- not quite as thick as like a hand cream, but close. It moisturizes well, but it can sting on the thinner skin of the décolletage, neck, and face, so fyi. After this one was used up I purchased Versed’s retinol body lotion and I prefer that one. It’s less creamy, thinner like a daily body lotion, no sting, and the moisturizing ingredients are really nice and soothing. So this is a decent deal for the price but I probably won’t buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product...low price
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this for almost 6 months & I would rate better than any of the way more expensive products on the market

reviews.reviewTitle: I sadly got a bad rash from this product
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product because it was recommended by a beauty blogger. Sadly I seem to be allergic to one of the ingredients because I got a bad rash all over my face and neck.
Nice and soft. Best buy budget friendly retinol that can be use face and body. Awesome !

reviews.reviewTitle: Gold bond age renew retinol overnight body and face lotion
reviews.reviewText: Very happy. Arrived within stated delivery time; neatly and carefully packaged and contents exactly as ordered.
Love that this contains retinol and a host of other peptides and niacinimide. Very moisturising and a little goes a long way.

I am happy with it. It is extra moisturizer and my skin (pron to allergies and reactions) tolerate it well. I am good Ng to buy again.Just be careful, as when I purchase it Amazon send me another cream that looks almost exactly like this one but didn't have retinol. But they replaced it on their cost, so no problem at all.
